value.name: Utah's FanX comic convention returning this year after skipping 2020 during COVID-19 pandemic
value.description: "This is going to be our best convention yet," FanX MC Chris Provost said at the event. A slew of new guests at FanX 2021 were also announced Tuesday, including "Mythbusters" star Adam Savage and ...

value.name: FanX adds Zachary Levi, Tye Sheridan to guest lineup for April event
value.description: Levi has appeared at FanX in Utah before, and he wanted to come back this time, said FanX emcee Chris Provost. “We’re thrilled with that,” Provost said. “He says it’s the fans.
